message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $85 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $87.50 for the product. It's a fair price, considering its value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $86 for the product.

I understand you're getting close to the price I'm willing to accept, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make another concession and offer $88 for the product. It's a fair price, considering its value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $87 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $89 for the product. It's a fair price, considering its value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $88.5 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to make a final offer of $89.25 for the product. This is my absolute best price, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me here.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $89 for the product.
